localNodeInformation: Tell us about your Logos Node
localNodeHelp: We need the address, port, and websocket port to connect.
severInfo: Local Nodes provide the best trustless environment. Official Logos Node is usually the easiest option.
forgotPasswordWarning: If you have forgotten your wallet you must re-import your seed. Performing this action will clear all the data in this application.
lastchancedelete: There is already a wallet associated with this application. By creating a new wallet or importing a new seed this will remove any existing data stored in this application.

delete.placeholder: Type delete to confirm the deletion of this wallet

whystore: You must backup your seed. If you lose your seed you will lose your Logos.
whywrite: Writing down your seed mnemonic will allow you to recover this wallet from anywhere. Do not lose this mnemonic store it in several secure places.
printWarning: WARNING: Printers can store past prints.
whyvalidate: Validating your seed ensures that you have written down your seed or stored a backup of your seed vault. Remember if you lose your seed you will lose your Logos.
importMethods: There are three different methods that can be used to import your seed.
notOpened: This account has not been opened
syncingWallet: Syncing Wallet with the Logos Blockchain
insufficientLogosFunds: Token account has insufficient Logos to cover transaction fee
sendAmountError: This is a required field and must be a positive decimal or integer value that is less than the current accounts balance
noTokensFound: No tokens associated with this wallet
trackThisTokenInTheDashboard: Track this token in the dashboard
stopTrackingThisTokenInTheDashboard: Stop tracking this token in the dashboard
abilityToMintTokens: Permanently set the ability to mint tokens to
abilityToRevokeTokens: Permanently set the ability to revoke tokens from users to
abilityToFreezeAccounts: Permanently set the ability to freeze accounts to
abilityToAdjustTokenFee: Permanently set the ability to adjust the token fee to
abilityToWhitelist: Permanently set the ability to have a whitelist to

accountSelectorErrors.notOpened: This account must be opened first before sending tokens to it
accountSelectorErrors.invalidAddress: This is not a valid address
accountSelectorErrors.tokenAccountError: You cannot send tokens to TokenAccounts.
accountSelectorErrors.needsWhitelisted: This account has not been whitelisted.
accountSelectorErrors.frozen: This account is frozen and cannot receive or send this token.
accountSelectorErrors.cameraAccess: Hey! I need access to your camera
accountSelectorErrors.cameraNotFound: Do you even have a camera on your device?
accountSelectorErrors.cameraNotSupported: Seems like this page is served in non-secure context (HTTPS, localhost or file://)
accountSelectorErrors.cameraNotUsable: Couldn't access your camera. Is it already in use?
accountSelectorErrors.cameraContrains: Constraints don't match any installed camera. Did you asked for the front camera although there is none?
